title: Grand Opening: Japan Heritage Nagasaki Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Dining Credit
description:
Be among the first to experience Nagasaki's history and culture from the recently opened Hotel Indigo Nagasaki Glover Street - a beautifully restored 100-year-old building located on the western coast of Kyushu. Stop by the unqiue chapel restaurant, flaunting towering stained-glass windows and mouthwatering local and international cuisine, before venturing out to explore the area.

Easily accessible by train or via direct flights from Osaka and Tokyo, Nagasaki is a rural escape and urban retreat rolled into one. Find yourself just a short stroll from Glover Gardenâ€™s Western-style mansions, the striking Oura Cathedral and the bustling Hamanomachi Arcade, where you can shop for quirky souvenirs and try the famous Nagasaki castella cakes.

title: Nagasaki Harbourside Hideaway near Glover Garden
description: In the leafy Minamiyamatemachi district, ANA Crowne Plaza Nagasaki Gloverhill, an IHG Hotel, is an urban oasis close to calming gardens and the ocean. Embark on a soothing stroll, visiting western-style heritage mansions and gorgeous greenery in Glover Garden, while Nagasaki Seaside Park boasts serene harbour views and lush lawns, both only a few minutes away. As the sun sets, savour Nagasaki cuisine at Pave restaurant and retire in comfort to a well-appointed room or suite.
